attributes.action: to freeze the fund of the No stone unturned LTD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to freeze the fund of no stone unturned ltd that is currently holding Donations of £1,005,000 that have been received to the fund to date.

Today they are seeking ways to use this fund for legal defence of themself not the search for missing child Madeline McCann.

Please do the right thing and freeze this fund at the very least until the conclusion of the case and see fit that it is refunded or distributed to a worthy charity for the cause of missing children or child abuse.

thank you

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
